name: google-cloud-logging
label: Google Cloud Logging
description: Cloud Logging is a fully managed service that allows you to store, search, analyze, monitor, and alert on logging data and events from Google Cloud.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server
fields.description: The service-based URI to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: The service-based URI to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Client ID
fields.name: client_id
fields.description: Unique Client ID of the Google Cloud Logging that is used to create an authentication token required to access the Google Cloud Logging API.
fields.tooltip: Unique Client ID of the Google Cloud Logging that is used to create an authentication token required to access the Google Cloud Logging API.

fields.title: Client Secret
fields.name: client_secret
fields.description: Unique Client Secret of the Google Cloud Logging that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API. For information on how to get the client secret, see https://developers.google.com/identity/protocols/oauth2/web-server.
fields.tooltip: Unique Client Secret of the Google Cloud Logging that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API.

fields.title: Authorization Code
fields.name: code
fields.tooltip: The authorization code that you acquired during the authorization step. For more information, see the Accessing the Google Cloud Logging API section.
fields.description: The authorization code that you acquired during the authorization step. For more information, see the Accessing the Google Cloud Logging API section.

fields.title: Redirect URL
fields.description: The redirect_uri of your app, where authentication responses can be sent and received by your app. It must exactly match one of the redirect_uri's you registered in the app registration portal.
fields.name: redirect_url
fields.tooltip: The redirect_uri of your app, where authentication responses can be sent and received by your app. It must exactly match one of the redirect_uri's you registered in the app registration portal.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Log Entries List
operations.description: Retrieve log entries that originated from a project/folder/organization/billing account from Google Cloud.

parameters.title: Resource Names
parameters.name: resourceNames
parameters.description: Specify the list of comma-separated resource names based on which you want to retrieve log entries from Google Cloud Logging.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the list of comma-separated resource names based on which you want to retrieve log entries from Google Cloud Logging.

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the filter using values of certain attributes, for example, protoPayload.requestMetadata.callerIp = <ip_address>, based on which you want to filter the locations retrieved from Google Cloud Logging.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the filter using values of certain attributes, for example, protoPayload.requestMetadata.callerIp = <ip_address>, based on which you want to filter the locations retrieved from Google Cloud Logging.

parameters.title: Order By
parameters.description: (Optional) Sorting order of the results, choose between Timestamp Ascending or Timestamp Descending. By default it set as Timestamp Ascending.
parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.tooltip: Note: We recommend setting the orderBy field to "Timestamp Descending" when listing recently ingested log entries. If not set, the default value of "Timestamp Ascending" may take a long time to fetch matching logs that are only recently ingested.

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum count of records that you want this operation to fetch from Google Cloud Logging. By default the value is 50 entries.
parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the maximum count of records that you want this operation to fetch from Google Cloud Logging. By default the value is 50 entries.

parameters.title: Page Token
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a Page Token if a previous operation returned a partial result. If the previous response contains a nextPageToken element, the value of the nextPageToken element includes a Page Token parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify a Page Token if a previous operation returned a partial result. If the previous response contains a nextPageToken element, the value of the nextPageToken element includes a Page Token parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
